name: deepwork.ai Design System
description: A friendly, approachable design system inspired by modern wellness/productivity apps. Light, airy, with playful accents and generous whitespace.

designPrinciples.name: Friendly & Approachable
designPrinciples.description: The UI should feel like a supportive friend, not a clinical tool. Soft colors, rounded shapes, and warm copy reduce anxiety around productivity tracking.

designPrinciples.name: Clarity Over Cleverness
designPrinciples.description: Every element earns its place. No decorative noise. Information hierarchy is immediately obvious through size, weight, and spacing.

designPrinciples.name: Generous Breathing Room
designPrinciples.description: Whitespace is a feature, not wasted space. Sections have large vertical gaps. Cards have comfortable internal padding. Nothing feels cramped.

designPrinciples.name: Soft Depth
designPrinciples.description: Use subtle shadows and layering to create depth without heaviness. Cards float gently above the background. No harsh drop shadows.

designPrinciples.name: Playful Personality
designPrinciples.description: Small moments of delight—a mascot, micro-illustrations, friendly microcopy—make the experience memorable without being childish.

designPrinciples.name: Consistent Roundness
designPrinciples.description: All corners are rounded. Buttons are pills. Cards have soft corners. This creates visual harmony and a friendly, modern feel.

background.description: Very light lavender-tinted off-white. Never pure white for large backgrounds—always a hint of warmth or coolness.

text.description: Dark charcoal for headings (not pure black). Medium grays for body. Light grays for captions/metadata.

brand.description: Soft violet-purple as the hero accent. Used sparingly for CTAs, highlights, and key UI elements. Light variant for backgrounds/badges.

fontFamily.heading: 'DM Sans', 'Inter', system-ui, sans-serif
fontFamily.description: DM Sans for headings (slightly more personality), Inter for body (maximum readability). Both are clean, modern sans-serifs with good x-height.

guidelines: Headings are bold and tight (negative letter-spacing)
Body text has generous line-height for readability
Use weight contrast (400 vs 600/700) rather than size alone for hierarchy
Overlines/labels use small caps with wide letter-spacing
Use multiples of 4px for all spacing
Sections need dramatic vertical breathing room (80px+)
Cards should feel spacious inside, not cramped
Inline elements (icon + text) use 8-12px gaps
Buttons: full (pill shape)
Cards: xl to 2xl (20-24px)
Input fields: lg (16px)
Small badges/tags: full or lg
Device mockups: 3xl+ (32px+)
Never use sharp corners except for very small elements
Shadows are soft and diffuse, never harsh
Use low opacity (4-12%) for natural feel
Cards have subtle shadows that increase on hover
Hero elements can have larger, more dramatic shadows

navigation.background: transparent or white with subtle blur
navigation.links: 14px, medium weight, neutral-600, hover to primary
navigation.cta: Small pill button, outline or filled

hero.layout: Two-column on desktop (copy left, visual right), stacked on mobile
hero.headline: Hero size, dark, tight line-height. Can highlight key phrase in brand color.
hero.subheadline: Body size, secondary text color, max-width 500-600px
hero.cta: Large pill button with primary gradient or solid fill, with optional secondary text link
hero.socialProof: Row of small stat cards or inline metrics below CTA

cards.shadow: card shadow, increases to cardHover on hover

featureCard.layout: Icon top or left, title, description
featureCard.title: h4 size, dark text

testimonialCard.layout: Quote text, then author info at bottom
testimonialCard.quote: Body or bodySmall, dark text, can use quotation marks or not
testimonialCard.author: Caption size, avatar optional, name + role

sectionHeader.headline: h2 size, dark, centered
sectionHeader.subheadline: bodySmall or body, secondary text, max-width 600px, centered

footer.layout: Logo, nav columns, social links, legal

patterns.heroBlobsOrClouds: Subtle organic shapes (clouds, blobs) in background using brand-primaryLight or gradients. Creates depth without distraction.
patterns.iconCircles: Icons often sit in soft-colored circles (40-48px) using brand-primaryLight
patterns.gradientAccents: Subtle gradients on hero headlines, CTAs, or decorative elements. Primary to a lighter shade.
patterns.cardGrids: 2-3 column grids on desktop, single column mobile. Consistent gap (16-24px).
patterns.illustrationStyle: Friendly, slightly cartoonish mascots or micro-illustrations. Soft colors, rounded shapes.

guidelines: Buttons: scale slightly on hover (1.02-1.05)
Cards: lift and shadow increase on hover
Page load: staggered fade-up for hero elements
Keep animations subtle and purposeful

layout.gridColumns: 12-column grid for complex layouts, simpler 2-3 col for cards

do: Use plenty of whitespace between sections
Use the brand purple sparingly for maximum impact
Make CTAs obvious with size, color, and shadow
Use real or realistic mockups to show the product
Use icons to support text, not replace it
dont: Overuse the brand color—it should pop, not overwhelm
Create cramped layouts with tight spacing
Add decorative elements that don't serve a purpose
